What to Do

Use the "double-submitted cookie" method as described by Felten and Zeller. This technique requires Javascript, so it may not work for browsers that have Javascript disabled.

Note: Note that this can probably be bypassed using XSS (CWE-79).

Additional Resources

  • For more information about the "double-submitted cookie" method, please see www.cs.utexas.edu/~shmat/courses/cs378/zeller.pdf
